section.title: OP Class Reference

para.para: The Output Processor receives actions from a state and uses the appropriate strategy.

listitem.para: call StorePrice using the pointer to the set strategy

section.section:
Detailed Description
The Output Processor receives actions from a state and uses the appropriate strategy.
The documentation for this class was generated from the following files: //wsl$/Debian/home/bytewise/github/CS586_Project/Part 2/include/OP.hpp//wsl$/Debian/home/bytewise/github/CS586_Project/Part 2/src/OP.cpp
